name: PerlaKnight
description:
A fantasy metroidvania in which the main character Perla meets a deer and encounters a more peaceful world in a dream. To live in the deer’s world she needs to find runes and gain their abilities by exploring and revisiting previous parts of the dungeon.

The source code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/IsjaslawEisenstadt/PerlaKnight

Made by:

Isjaslaw Eisenstadt
Monika Krebel
Tobias Lohmüller
David Mohren
Minh Truong
